overview: This documentary invites film professionals of different ages to share their life and debate. In stories of their own careers with an open mind, giving an angle that others might not have imagined. The film reveals the wounds and the pressure in a most straightforward way in order to allow viewers to receive complete information about the profession in all aspects with complete roundness. At first, it will be a story about a career of an actress. Points of view from actors, 6 women of different perspectives and ages.
title: Roundness
